```
find x xs = case xs of
  | []     -> False
  | y::xs' -> if x == y then True else find x xs' 
```

```
type Tree a = Empty | Node a (Tree a) (Tree a)

findBT x t = case t of
  Empty             -> False
  Node y left right -> x == y || findBT x left || findBT x right 
```

```
findBST x t = case t of
  Empty -> False
  Node y left right ->
    if | x == y -> True
       | x <  y -> findBST x left
       | x >  y -> findBST x right 
```
